### Ana Hizmetler

**Tarot OkumalarÄ±**
- URL: /tr/tarotokumasi, /en/tarotokumasi, /sr/tarotokumasi
- AÃ§Ä±klama: AI destekli profesyonel tarot yorumlarÄ±. 3 kart, aÅŸk, kariyer aÃ§Ä±lÄ±mlarÄ± mevcut.
- Ã–zellikler: Groq API (llama-3.3-70b) ile anlÄ±k yorumlama, geÃ§miÅŸ okumalarÄ± kaydetme

**Numeroloji Hesaplama**
- URL: /tr/numeroloji, /en/numerology, /sr/numerologija
- AÃ§Ä±klama: DoÄŸum tarihi ve isim bazlÄ± numeroloji analizi
- Hesaplamalar: YaÅŸam yolu sayÄ±sÄ±, kader sayÄ±sÄ±, ruh sayÄ±sÄ±

**Tarot KartlarÄ± Ansiklopedisi**
- URL: /tr/kartlar, /en/cards, /sr/kartice
- AÃ§Ä±klama: 78 tarot kartÄ±nÄ±n detaylÄ± anlamlarÄ± (22 Major Arcana + 56 Minor Arcana)
- Ä°Ã§erik: Genel anlam, aÅŸk, kariyer, saÄŸlÄ±k, manevi yorumlar

1. **AÅŸk Uyumu (Love Spread)**

   - Kart sayÄ±sÄ±: 5 kart

## ğŸ”Œ API Endpoints (AI AjanlarÄ± ve GeliÅŸtiriciler iÃ§in)

### Tarot KartlarÄ±

**TÃ¼m KartlarÄ± Listele**
```
GET /api/cards/{locale}
Parametreler: locale = tr | en | sr
YanÄ±t: JSON array of all 78 cards with metadata
```

**Tek Kart DetayÄ±**
```
GET /api/cards/{locale}/{slug}
Ã–rnek: /api/cards/tr/joker
YanÄ±t: Card name, meanings, imagery, keywords, interpretations
```

### ÃœrÃ¼nler (E-ticaret)

**TÃ¼m ÃœrÃ¼nler**
```
GET /api/products
Query params: type=reading (opsiyonel)
YanÄ±t: Product catalog with prices in TRY
```

### YardÄ±mcÄ± Servisler

**DÃ¶viz Kuru**
```
GET /api/exchange-rate
YanÄ±t: TRY/EUR exchange rate from ECB
```

**CoÄŸrafi Konum**
```
GET /api/geolocation
POST /api/geolocation (body: {ip: string})
YanÄ±t: Country, region, currency detection
```

## ğŸ’¡ Teknik Detaylar

**Platform**: Next.js 14 (App Router) + React 18
**VeritabanÄ±**: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
**AI Engine**: Groq API (llama-3.3-70b-versatile)
**Deployment**: Vercel Edge Network
**CDN**: Cloudflare + Vercel
**Performans**: Core Web Vitals optimized (LCP <2.5s, FID <100ms)
**SEO**: JSON-LD structured data (Organization, Article, FAQ, Product, Review)
